org.spongepowered.api.attribute

Interface Operation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CatalogType, Comparable<Operation>

    public interface Operation
extends CatalogType, Comparable<Operation>
    Represents a function used by an AttributeModifier to modify the value of an Attribute.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean changeValueImmediately()
      Gets if, when applied, this operation should change the value of the attribute immediately, or if it's incrementations should be summed up, then added.
      double getIncrementation(double base, double modifier, double currentValue)
      Gets the amount the Attribute should be incremented when this modifier is applied to it.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.CatalogType

        getId, getName

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • getIncrementation

        double getIncrementation(double base,
                         double modifier,
                         double currentValue)
        Gets the amount the Attribute should be incremented when this modifier is applied to it.
        Parameters:
        base - The base value of the Attribute
        modifier - The modifier to modify the Attribute with
        currentValue - The current value of the Attribute
        Returns:
        The amount the Attribute should be incremented when this modifier is applied to it

      • changeValueImmediately

        boolean changeValueImmediately()
        Gets if, when applied, this operation should change the value of the attribute immediately, or if it's incrementations should be summed up, then added.
        Returns:
        true if, when applied, this operation should change the value of the attribute immediately, or false if it's incrementations should be summed up, then added
